page.title: 11Shopping
page.content: Shopping is a high priority for all families.Most people(60%) make such purchases everyday and for these the local small shops are convenient." A local shop is where I spend my pocket money. Mum buys a pint of milk and Gran does all her shopping because it is a friendly place." Family shopping on a weekly basis needs a car to travel to a favoured Supermarket.Frequently this is a family outing.For special occaision shopping e.g. at Christmas,the nearby cities of Chester and Liverpool are used. Local street markets(Thursday and Sunday) are very popular. " Every Sunday I go with my family to Coed Mawr Market.We travel by bus.There are many different stalls and the stall holders shout out prices and bargains and it gets quite crowded"
